name: Weather master (Yellow Panda Games)
description:
Do you want to be the weather master?

 Here, you can rely on your talent to become the weather master. Any combination of weather elements can spawn new elemental attacks. Join us!

Fight the oncoming pirates and steal their treasures using your fire, wind, water, lightning and tornado powers! Send them flying into the air as powerful hurricanes of molten lava scorch them.
